property.mainSummary: This beautifully maintained original Edwardian Semi-detached house overlooks Ruskin Park on a quiet road. It has outstanding views, beautifully proportioned rooms, original features and lots of natural light. There are four bedrooms, three reception rooms and a ground floor W.C. Two large loft spaces ideal for converting STPP. The house naturally has four bedrooms but is currently configured as five smaller rooms. Finsen Road is a highly sought-after road with a terrific community. Walking distance to Denmark Hill Station and Kings College Hospital as well as to Loughborough Junction station and good bus routes. Ruskin Park has tennis courts, paddling pool, playground, summer bandstand concerts and fetes. A well-loved family home.

Well presented one bed flat on the second floor of this Victorian conversion. This share of freehold flat has a huge living room and separate kitchen diner, lots of character throughout with city skyline views. Popular location with easy access to Brixton Village, shops bars, restaurants and tube. Loughborough Junction, Denmark Hill, Ruskin Park, King's College Hospital and Camberwell are all within easy walking distance. A well proportioned flat on a quiet residential street with excellent transport links. A great investment opportunity in this up and coming area.

property.propertyFeature7: Two bathrooms and GF shower room
property.mainSummary: Impressive and spacious Victorian property; this six bedroom semi detached house is large and full of charm. Five double bedrooms, into the natural attic floor. Two large reception rooms on the ground floor, modern fitted kitchen leading out to a large walled garden. There is a ground floor W.C and shower, lots of storage and Period features. The house is opposite Ruskin Park on Denmark Hill and very close to Denmark Hill station, Kings College Hospital. There is potential for off street parking on the front where a small garage currently sits. A beautiful family home in a popular location.

A beautifully presented well laid out Victorian split level apartment. This large property has the feel of a house and provides similar accommodation. A large lounge with big window and fireplace, kitchen with space to dine, two double bedrooms, brand new family bathroom upstairs and additional W.C downstairs. There is even space for a work station on the landing. Very well presented throughout. Located within walking distance of Brixton Tube, (Victoria Line) and Loughborough junction station (Blackfriars and St. Pancras) Kings College hospital and Camberwell. Long Leasehold at over 100 years, annual service charge approximately £600 PA.

A rare and elegant Georgian townhouse, on one of the best Georgian terraces in London. One of the few on this sought after terrace with five storeys. Ample and flexible accommodation in beautiful condition with restored original Georgian features. There is a detached cottage at the rear of the garden with an integral garage, making this home very special. Attractive front and rear gardens and a wonderful view of St Giles Church from the front windows. A peaceful and charming place to live, in the midst of the eclectic delights of Camberwell, Denmark Hill and Peckham. Walking distance to Kings College Hospital & Ruskin Park. An enviable and sought after residence.

A beautiful, four bedroom, extended family home in the heart of Herne Hill. Walking distance to Ruskin Park; with it's summer bandstand concerts and paddling pool. St. Saviour's & Jessop's school, in the catchment for The Charter School. Herne Hill farmers market, Brockwell park, gym and lido. This well presented Victorian terrace has been extended to the rear, to create a large family kitchen with an Island and skylights emphasising space and light. Large lounge, with period fireplace, there are two bathrooms, an additional downstairs W.C. The house has a modern feel, yet careful attention has been given to the preservation of period features.

Five bedroom family home on a quiet tree-lined road. Naturally light kitchen / diner leading out into a generous private garden. Good condition throughout and retaining many original features, whilst also having the scope to expand and improve the property. The house has been fully double glazed and rewired with smoke and co detectors throughout. Excellent transport links to Central London via Tulse Hill station and several bus routes. Rosemead Prep and Rosendale Primary are amongst other outstanding schools in the area. Plenty of parks and green spaces locally, including Brockwell Park, with its lido, café and tennis courts.

Beautifully maintained and extended family home. Benefiting from a recent, state of the art side return extension, which incorporates a stylish, high-spec and functional imported Italian kitchen. Gas fired underfloor heating in the Kitchen. Well-considered spaces throughout, with plenty of natural light. Three good sized bedrooms, family bathroom, through lounge with two Victorian fireplaces and other preserved period features. Large bi-folding doors at the rear of the property lead out to an easy to maintain, landscaped garden. Bespoke fitted Neville Johnson furniture, providing clever and stylish storage and work spaces. In the heart of Ruskin Village; close to Ruskin Park, with its summer bandstand concerts and paddling pool. Walking distance to King's College Hospital, Denmark Hill Station, Brixton tube & Herne Hill farmers market.

property.displayAddress: Ruskin Park House, Champion Hill, London
property.mainSummary: A beautiful example of a Ruskin Park House apartment. The apartment is on the ground floor and overlooks the immaculate communal gardens. The lounge opens out to a balcony, with planters and a seating area. Modern fitted kitchen with built in appliances. There are two double bedrooms, bathroom and separate W.C. Parquet teak flooring throughout, the apartment has a really good feel to it. Ruskin Park House is a desirable building of purpose built apartments, maintained to a high standard by the onsite estate manager and caretakers. The character of the block is sought after and due to the prohibition of renting the apartments out to tenants the estate maintains a community feel and familiarity. Very close to Denmark Hill station, Ruskin Park, Herne Hill and its Village farmers market, Peckham and Brixton with vibrant nightlife are close by. Share of freehold, long lease.

Large split level maisonette, in small purpose built block. Three double bedrooms upstairs, with bathroom and separate W.C. On the first floor there is a large lounge with a small balcony, ample space for sofas and a dining table. Good sized kitchen and heaps of storage throughout. The apartment has lots of natural light and a really good feel overall. Outside there is a large walled garden, shared by the 5 flats in the block. You have additional space at the back for a small table and chairs. Long leasehold and annual service charge is around £1,000PA. The location is great as you can walk to Denmark Hill Station and get to Camberwell and Peckham easily.

epc.buildingName: Flat E 2 Shenley Road EPC Report

property.mainSummary: A beautifully designed family home located on the popular Royal Circus. The house has a lovely garden with a stunning panoramic view of the city. Walking distance to West Norwood and Norwood High Street shops, restaurants and cafes. The house is well presented with period features and lots of natural light. A professional loft conversion providing a large bright master bedroom and bathroom. Two good sized reception rooms downstairs. The open plan kitchen diner overlooks the garden, which has a decked area and workshop / outhouse with power and light. Located within walking distance of West Norwood and Tulse Hill Stations.

A charming Edwardian house arranged over 3 floors, next to the iconic Carnegie library with its lovely garden. There are five double bedrooms, two large reception rooms with Edwardian fireplaces and huge windows, with an abundance of natural light. The rear reception room looks out onto a wide, partially-walled, mature, south facing garden. The original Edwardian veranda is a lovely feature and there is an insulated side-access, walk-through shed; perfect for bikes, gardening equipment, muddy boots and dogs! The owners have paid special attention to the upkeep having had the original wooden floorboards in the lounge fully insulated, and windows refurbished with 'brushes'. Close to four stations (Loughborough Junction, Herne Hill, North Dulwich and Denmark Hill for the overground service). Very close to Ruskin Park in the heart of Herne Hill.

At almost 1400 Sq. Ft. this apartment is bigger than some Victorian terrace houses. It is arranged over the top two full floors, has an abundance of natural light and a feeling of space. There is a large lounge at the front, good-sized kitchen diner, recently refitted with stylish units. All four bedrooms are double bedrooms and there are two bathrooms. Walking distance to Brixton Tube, Loughborough Junction, Denmark Hill. Share of Freehold.

1950s bright and spacious, four double bedroom Freehold, family home. Complete with front garden, large south facing back garden and a side/corner plot. Lots of potential to improve including side extension and/or loft conversion subject to planning consents. There is a good sized family kitchen, with space for a dining table, ground floor W.C., sunny living room, four double bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs. Located in a popular residential area, around the corner from desirable Bessemer Grange primary school and close to The Charter secondary school, North Dulwich. Walking distance to Herne Hill, Sunray Gardens, Denmark Hill, Dulwich, Brockwell and Ruskin Parks. Good rail links to central London from North Dulwich (London Bridge), Herne Hill (Victoria/Blackfriars/St Pancras), Denmark Hill (London Overground) stations. Chain Free

Well presented family home, located in a popular residential area in Brixton. End of terrace, with planning permission for a loft conversion. Through lounge reception room and modern kitchen diner with under floor heating. Three bedrooms and a bathroom on the first floor. Popular area for families, with easy access to Brockwell Park and Clapham Common. Great transport links at Brixton and Clapham, along with bars, shops, restaurants, Brixton Village and Picture House. Offer chain free and ready to move into. Planning permission Ref. No: 18/01632/LDCP | Received: Sun 15 Apr 2018 | Validated: Fri 20 Apr 2018 | Status: Decided

Stunning two bedroom purpose built flat situated on Grove Lane. Very close to Denmark Hill station and King's college hospital. The interior design maximises the space and light creating a beautiful feel throughout. Being on the end of the block, there is a huge window on the side and a lovely balcony, with views into the green space and tree tops outside. Stylish entertaining kitchen, two double bedrooms and a modern bathroom make this flat a terrific buy. The location is excellent and Camberwell, Peckham and East Dulwich shops and nightlife are all within walking distance. Lease 125 from May 1989 so 96 years remaining.

Urban Village. Three double bedroom, light and spacious top floor purpose built flat with balcony. Walking distance to Kings College Hospital and Denmark Hill Station, Ruskin Park and Herne Hill farmers market. The apartment is well laid out and renovated to a high standard with solid wood sound proofed flooring, double glazing and gas central heating. Long leasehold. Offered chain free. Leasehold 96 Years. Ground rent £10PA. S/charge £1400 PA

A beautifully refurbished three-bedroom house with private driveway in a quiet cul-de-sac in the heart of Peckham. This lovely family home has modern decor throughout, the large open plan living/dining room leads through to the newly renovated kitchen. From the kitchen you have direct access to the private sunny west-facing garden. Upstairs is a large, bright master bedroom with built-in wardrobes. There are two further bedrooms and a newly-decorated bathroom. The property has a generous loft space providing extra storage perfect for a growing family. The house is set in a peaceful cul-de-sac a few minutes walk from the vibrant shops bars and restaurants in Peckham. Peckham Rye station is a 10-minute walk with direct services to London Bridge and Victoria. A great area for families, with its large library, leisure centre and parks.

Needing full modernisation and remedial works a large Victorian House on a popular road in Camberwell. The accommodation is arranged over 3 full floors and half landings and includes a cellar. There are 5 bedrooms, two receptions, two bathrooms and a good sized garden with a shed. Located within walking distance of Denmark Hill Station. Marketing price to allow for sensible offers. Viewings strictly by appointment through Urban Village.

A delightful bright and airy top floor Victorian apartment, in central Camberwell. Two double bedrooms, living room, separate kitchen, with space for a small dining table. Large skylight lets lots of natural light in. A pleasant spacious flat, ideal for a couple or professional sharers. Walking distance to Elephant and Castle, Kennington and Denmark Hill. Very close to Kings College hospital. Tenanted until March 2020 months - buy to let only.

Bright and sunny, two bedroom apartment located with in easy reach of the amenities of Camberwell or Brixton. Arranged over the top two floors of this pretty Victorian house the apartment is very well presented and has lots of storage. A short walk to Denmark Hill station, Kings college hospital and Loughborough junction with swift access to Blackfriars and Kings Cross. Excellent schools and local community around Ruskin Park, with its famous paddling pool, summer band stand concerts and mid-summer fete. Leasehold 125 years from 2012. £150 pa ground rent. Service charge is 30% of any shared maintenance costs.

Stunning two bedroom split level purpose built flat situated on Camberwell Grove. Very close to Denmark Hill station and King's college hospital. The reception room has an open plan design which maximises the natural light making it a great space to entertain. This leads out to a pretty private garden. Two double bedrooms and a modern bathroom make this flat a terrific buy. The location is excellent and Camberwell, Peckham and East Dulwich shops and nightlife are all within walking distance. Leasehold (94 Years)

property.propertyFeature10: Kings College Hospital and Ruskin Park
property.mainSummary: A top floor split level Victorian apartment. Open plan living and kitchen makes it perfect for entertaining. A double bedroom and bathroom on the third floor and the loft with en suite WC is on the top floor. Well designed spaces, with good storage and a bright and airy feel. Located very close to Loughborough junction station, with fast connections to Blackfriars, Kings Cross and Luton Airport. Walking distance to Brixton Tube & Brixton Village. Denmark Hill, Ruskin park and Kings College Hospital. Share of freehold.

Pretty Victorian mid terraced house, located in Herne Hill, very close to Herne Hill station. Trains from Herne Hill go to Victoria and Blackfriars, Farringdon. The house is in good condition with period features such as sash windows and Victorian fireplaces. Three bedrooms, upstairs bathroom and WC. The kitchen has been replaced in recent years and has a space for a table. Raised secluded garden at the rear. Herne Hill is a very popular area, has excellent amenities, farmer's market, Brockwell Park and Lido, and an eclectic mix of delicatessens and restaurants.

Stunning, extended Victorian end of terrace. Located within walking distance of Brixton Tube, Denmark Hill, Herne Hill and Loughborough Junction. In the heart of sought after residential roads surrounding Ruskin Park, with its Summer band stand concerts and famous paddling pool. The house has been extended and has a wonderful living and entertaining space, lots of natural light and period features. There are five bedrooms, having had a large loft conversion in recent years, Two bathrooms and a downstairs W.C. Landscaped south facing garden and pretty frontage.

A large and very well presented apartment at the top of Denmark Mansions. Walking distance to Denmark Hill, Kings College hospital, Ruskin Park, Brixton tube, bars and shops. Two double bedrooms, lovely lounge, with bi-folding doors leading to the dining room. Modern fitted kitchen and bathroom, very well presented with Period features. Shares a wonderful roof top garden with the residents in the mansion block.

property.propertyFeature4: Open plan lounge and dining room
property.mainSummary: A beautiful three bedroom apartment on the second floor of Ruskin Park House. Very spacious and bright with two balconies. Open plan living and entertaining space, with windows at either end and room to seat up to 14 people on a large dining table comfortably! High specification kitchen, polished cork flooring. All three bedrooms fit double beds. Family bathroom and separate laundry cupboard with washing machine and tumble dryer. Just two apartments on this level, likely the largest size of the Ruskin Park House apartments. Walking distance to Kings College Hospital, Denmark Hill Station, Herne Hill and Ruskin Park. Long Leasehold with share in the Landlord Company.

This beautifully maintained original Edwardian Semi-detached house overlooks Ruskin Park on a very quiet road. It has outstanding views, beautifully proportioned rooms, original features and lots of natural light. There are four bedrooms, three reception rooms and a side extension used as a utility room and garden store. Its charming kitchen leads into the dining room with space for an AGA range. 2 large loft spaces ideal for converting STPP. Pretty well-stocked gardens front and rear. Finsen Road is a highly sough- after road with a terrific community. Walking distance to Denmark Hill Station and Kings College Hospital as well as to Loughborough Junction station and good buses. Ruskin Park has tennis courts, paddling pool, playground summer bandstand concerts and fetes. A well-loved family home.

property.propertyFeature4: Very large for a one bed!
property.mainSummary: A bright and airy third floor apartment in a modern purpose built block. The flat is exceptionally large and would accommodate a second bedroom in terms of the space! There is a large balcony at the front looking out towards Brixton Hill at tree top level. Double glazing, electric heating, well designed with good built in storage and natural light. The block is set back from the road and a dance studio occupies the ground floor of the building. Very well presented, long leasehold. Close to Brixton Village, POP and Brixton tube. A great apartment in an excellent location.

Stylish top floor eco-apartment in this stunning, award winning, architecturally designed building. Arranged over the top two floors with incredible skyline views. The accommodation is arranged to maximise space and light with the main living accommodation on the top floor and completely open plan. Downstairs there are three bedrooms, one has an en suite, plus a good sized family bathroom and separate laundry area. Both floors have balconies stretching across the south facing side of the building. There is secure gated car parking, cycle storage and a passenger lift to all floors. Walking distance to Denmark Hill and East Dulwich station, shops and restaurants nearby.

An iconic round bayed, two bedroom apartment on the first floor of Ruskin Park House. Spacious and bright with a balcony. Modern kitchen with washing machine and dishwasher, large luxurious bathroom. Well presented with the original stripped baker light floors and stripped Crittall windows. Walking distance to Kings College Hospital, Denmark Hill Station, Herne Hill and Ruskin Park. Long Leasehold 143 years with share in the Landlord Company. Management charge £850.00 per quarter. There are also allotments, storage cupboards and bike stores and communal laundry. Garages and parking available.

A well-presented one double bedroom apartment on the first floor in Ruskin Park House. Spacious and bright with a balcony. Modern kitchen with washing machine and dishwasher, large tiled bathroom. Solid wood flooring and original Crittall windows, pleasant views. Walking distance to Kings College Hospital, Denmark Hill Station, Herne Hill and Ruskin Park.Leasehold (143 years) with a share in the Landlord Company. Ruskin Park is popular due to its interesting Architecture and very well maintained communal grounds and location

Beautifully light and airy two bedroom Victorian Conversion apartment. First floor with planning permission for a 2.5m x 2.5m roof terrace. The apartment is share of freehold and located within walking distance to Denmark hill Station, Peckham Rye and Kings College Hospital. Open plan kitchen and lounge, makes a great entertaining space, sash windows, and good storage. Lucas Gardens, is like your own garden; just a few meters away at the end of Maude Road, where one can enjoy a walk or sunny coffee on a Sunday morning.

property.propertyFeature7: Herne Hill BR and Farmers Mkt
property.mainSummary:
Three Bedroom mid-terrace Victorian house fully renovated by current owners. Very well presented throughout, with period fireplaces, character and style. A friendly family home feel. Large reception room, ground floor W.C. and stylish kitchen that opens up to a pretty walled garden. Three good-sized double bedrooms and a lovely bathroom upstairs with UFH. There is potential to extend up into the loft area and side return STPP. The house is located within walking distance to Brixton Tube, Loughborough Junction, Denmark hill, and Herne Hill station and farmers market. Close to Ruskin Park, and Brockwell Park, excellent schools and community.
.

A two bedroom ground floor maisonette in excellent condition with south facing garden. Beautifully presented with original features and high ceilings. Large reception room and master bedroom both have original fireplaces. The spacious kitchen with its separate utility room is bright, well designed and leads out to a pretty rear garden. The second bedroom and modern bathroom receive lots of natural light. This property has been renovated to a very high standard a new kitchen and bathroom suit which compliment refurbished original Victorian radiators and wooden floors. Close to Herne Hill, Denmark Hill Stations and Ruskin park, a good selection of local shops and gastro pub. Loughborough Junction station ( Blackfriars and St. Pancras) walking distance to Brixton tube and Kings College hospital. Leasehold 98 years, £10 GR S/charge £1000 PA

A handsome G2 listed; Georgian Townhouse with exceptional period features and charm. One of the most sought after property styles in in London and in the Grove Lane conservation area. Completely unmodernised; the four storey townhouse is a perfect opportunity for individual restoration and style. There are up to six bedrooms; depending on how you use the space, the first floor lounge has floor to ceiling windows looking out towards Love Walk, with original wrought iron balcony. There is a pretty walled garden at the rear. This exceptional house is situated very close to Denmark Hill station, with fast Ginger line (LO) links to the City and West End. London Blackfriars in 12 minutes. Option to add mansard on roof STPP.

Victorian mid-terrace family home. A well maintained house with two receptions and three bedrooms and period features. The house has a good sized kitchen diner, reasonable sized garden. Located West of Peckham Hill Street near Bell Gardens and Harris Academy (secondary school). Walking distance to Peckham Rye and Queens road stations, with swift access to the City and East End. Great local amenities and nightlife. Peckham voted the coolest place to live in 2018 according to MoveBubble. The house is chain free and ready to purchase. It has solar panels on the roof and cellar.

A beautiful two bed apartment on the top floor of Ruskin Park House, Overlooking the communal gardens this flat has original floors, windows, a curved corridor and lots of character.The modern kitchen with its integrated appliances and the large family bathroom make this apartment feel very spacious. The south facing balcony is a perfect sun trap. Ruskin Park House is a desirable building of purpose built apartments, maintained to a high standard by the onsite estate manager and caretakers. Very close to Denmark Hill station, Ruskin Park, Herne Hill and its Village farmers market, Peckham and Brixton with vibrant nightlife are close by. Share of freehold, long lease.

Well presented third floor apartment in a purpose built block. One double bedroom, one bathroom and an open-plan Kitchen and living room. The apartment has lots of storage including a loft space and allocated off street parking. 122 year lease. Service charge £1440 per year and ground rent £200. The apartment has a lovely cosy feel and is with in walking distance to the amenities in Camberwell and Peckham and numerous little parks and green spaces.

Well presented top floor apartment, with gated parking, communal garden and secure bicycle storage. Lots of natural light and well laid out. There are two double bedrooms, large lounge, well fitted kitchen with breakfast bar and a sunny balcony looking out towards the Surrey canal path. The apartment is about 15 years old and has reasonably low outgoings, making it perfect for first time buyers. A great location with swift access into the City, West End and Central London. Perfect for cycle commuters with cycle routes taking through the local parks. Peckham Rye station is nearby along with numerous excellent bus routes. Peckham levels, Bussey building, nightlife and eateries make this a popular location to live.

Beautiful 3 double bedroom split level Victorian garden flat on Herne Hill Road. Walking distance to Brixton Tube, Loughborough Junction & Denmark Hill. Impressive lounge with large bay window and fireplace. All 3 bedrooms are large enough for double beds. The kitchen at the rear of the property overlooks the garden, with bifold glass doors and has space for a large table and chairs. The master bedroom en-suite is part of the stylish basement conversion.
Very close to St Saviours, Jessops and Charter Schools. Located in the Ruskin Park Village area with Ruskin park summer bandstand concerts and padding pool. Brixton nightlife bars and restaurants in the Village are within walking distance. Herne Hill farmers market, Brockwell Park lido, new local gym. Share of freehold.

A Freehold house, close to Waterloo Stations, Southwark tube. Centrally located, within walking distance of Thames River Walk, IMAX, The Cut, The Old Vic Theatre. You can easily walk into the City of London and Covent Garden. This pretty mid terrace house, comprises of a '2 up 2 down' configuration and can be greatly improved. A blank canvass, requiring basic modernisation. Freehold, chain free, ready to buy. You can add a double storey extension to the rear (STPP) and open up the ground floor with a interior design.

Period style cottage located in this popular private cul-de-sac, with residents parking. This is a end of terrace house situated in the Rosendale Road conservation area and only a short stroll from Brockwell Park. Two double bedrooms, large family bathroom, recently fitted kitchen with double glazing throughout. The house is well presented, has wooden floors, a huge floor to ceiling window which floods the kitchen with natural light. Well kept garden to the rear is a real sun trap. Residents permit parking. Walking distance to Herne Hill where excellent transport links can be found as well as shops and cafes. Rosendale Primary school is within easy reach. A terrific area for young families.

A spacious end terrace Victorian House, located in the popular Ruskin Park area of Denmark Hill. Three double bedrooms, through lounge, extended kitchen and two bathrooms. Side access to rear garden. Potential to covert the loft (STPD). A great location, walking distance to Loughborough junction station, Brixton tube, Ruskin Park, Denmark Hill and Kings College Hospital. Offered chain free, quick sale preferred.

A Two bedroom, two bathroom, Victorian split level apartment. Sole use of private garden at the rear which is accessible from both floors. A large lounge with bay window, high ceilings and fireplace leads through to the kitchen which has space to dine and under floor heating through out. Two bedrooms, modern and stylish bathrooms. Very well presented throughout. Located within walking distance of Brixton Tube, (Victoria Line) and Loughborough Junction station (Blackfriars and St. Pancras) Kings College hospital and Camberwell. Long Leasehold and low service charge.

Top floor one bed apartment in the popular Ruskin Park House estate. Overlooking the London sky line this flat has original floors, windows, and lots of character. The kitchen has modern appliances yet has retained the original layout and larder cupboard. The balcony is accessible from the living room and bedroom. Ruskin Park House is a desirable building of purpose built apartments, maintained to a high standard by the onsite estate manager and caretakers. Very close to Denmark Hill station, Ruskin Park, Herne Hill and its Village farmers market, East Dulwich, Lordship Lane, Peckham and Brixton with vibrant nightlife are close by. Share of freehold, long lease. Service Charge £2,680.

Two bedroom apartment on the fourth floor in Ruskin Park House. Spacious and bright with great views from all rooms as well as the balcony. Modern kitchen and large bathroom. Original flooring and Crittall windows have allowed this flat to retain much of the charm that makes Ruskin Park house so popular. Walking distance to Kings College Hospital, Denmark Hill Station, Herne Hill and Ruskin Park. Leasehold (119 years) with a share in the Landlord Company. Ruskin Park is popular due to its interesting Architecture and very well maintained communal grounds and location. Service Charge £3,372.52

Large five bedroom, semi - detached family house. Recently extended and renovated to a high standard; reluctantly selling due to unforeseen circumstances. The property has recently had an architecturally designed basement conversion providing contemporary open plan living, dining and kitchen space with a luxurious feel; bi-folding doors lead out of the basement to a large rear garden. On the first floor, there is a lounge and two guest bedrooms, and a W.C, on the top floor; three bedrooms and a family bathroom. Off street parking on the front for three cars. Walking distance to Penge East, Penge West and Anerley Stations; trains to London Victoria and London Bridge.

property.displayAddress: Ruskin Park House, Champion Hill, London
property.mainSummary: A beautiful two bed apartment on the top floor of Ruskin Park House, Overlooking the communal gardens this flat has just been completely renovated to a very high standard with brand new kitchen, bathroom, electrics, flooring and decoration through out. The south facing balcony is a perfect sun trap and with its large round bay window this ready to move into flat has all the charm that Ruskin Park House is famous for. Ruskin Park House is a desirable building of purpose built apartments, maintained to a high standard by the onsite estate manager and caretakers. Very close to Denmark Hill station, Ruskin Park, Herne Hill and its Village farmers market, Peckham and Brixton with vibrant nightlife are close by. Share of freehold, long lease.

property.propertyFeature10: Kings College Hospital and Ruskin Park
property.mainSummary: Gilesmead is a very popular 1970's block on Camberwell Church Street. This split level apartment has a light open plan ground floor that opens up the a private back garden. The well laid out second floor has a family bathroom, two good sized double bedrooms, wall to wall windows, and heaps of storage. The block includes a private bike store, off street parking and communal gardens. Within close distance of the trendy Peckham nightlife, cafes and restaurants of Camberwell Green and the ever popular Brixton. Local transport is excellent and you are surrounded by green spaces of Burgess Park, Brunswick Park and Ruskin Park. Located less than 2 miles South of London Bridge, you could hop on a bike and be Central in under half an hour. 89 year lease, active residents association. Annual service charge £2,350 includes heating, hot water, gated parking & buildings insurance.

A beautiful example of a Ruskin Park House apartment. The apartment is on the third floor and overlooks the immaculate communal gardens. The lounge opens out to a south facing balcony, with planters and a seating area. There are two double bedrooms, a large bathroom, lots of storage and a modern fitted kitchen with built in appliances. Wooden flooring throughout, the apartment has a really good feel to it. Ruskin Park House is a desirable building of purpose built apartments, maintained to a high standard by the onsite estate manager and caretakers. Very close to Denmark Hill station, Ruskin Park, Herne Hill and its Village farmers market, Peckham and Brixton with vibrant nightlife are close by. Share of freehold, long lease.

Ground floor apartment in St.Georges Court. Requiring some updating the apartment has double glazing and gas central heating, basic kitchen and bathroom. Good size lounge, double and a single bedroom. There is a new lease at 125 years. Garden Row is located off of St. Georges Road near Southbank University, Elephant and Castle Tube. The Thames River Walk, Southbank, Borough market and London Bridge. Offered chain free.

Pretty ground floor garden flat, with a very long lease. Located on a popular residential road, close to Ruskin Park and the excellent transport links at Loughborough Junction and Denmark Hill. Brixton tube, POP and Market within walking distance. There is a reception room with fireplace and bay window, plantation shutters, double bedroom, bathroom and nicely designed kitchen leading out to a private garden. Other attractions; local gym, summer bandstand concerts, fetes, local eateries and coffee shops. Fast trains to City and West End. Kings college hospital.

Beautifully presented, two bedroom ground floor maisonette in excellent condition with SHARED south facing garden. Large open plan reception room leads out to a pretty rear garden. Close to Herne Hill, Denmark Hill Stations and Ruskin park, a good selection of local shops and gastro pub. Loughborough Junction station ( Blackfriars and St. Pancras) walking distance to Brixton tube and Kings College hospital. Leasehold 98 years, £10 GR S/charge £1000 PA

A large split level apartment located on the leafy Grosvenor Park in Camberwell. Close to Burgess Park with its cafe, lake and cycle route to the City. The apartment is on the top two floors of this elegant Victorian property (just one other flat beneath) it comes with a large garden. There are two double bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs and lounge (with two sash windows) and a kitchen diner on the lower floor. Some period features and a feeling of space. Offered with a long leasehold (Southwark Council).

A lovely two storey property with sole use of private garden. In excellent condition throughout with two double bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs with terrific storage. Downstairs at garden level there is a large sunny reception room and fitted kitchen. Situated on a family friendly estate with access to allotments and communal gardens. Located in Camberwell with easy access into Central London, West End, Peckham nightlife; Bussey Building and The Level's. Brixton Market and Brixton Pop. Lots of local gastro pubs, coffee shops, gym and pool in Camberwell. Absolutely perfect starter home. Long leasehold. Annual service charge is £2100 and includes heating and hot water.

A large freehold property in need of modernisation with heaps of potential. Located close to Camberwell Green, Loughborough Junction station, Brixton tube, POP and Brixton Market. Denmark Hill and Kings college hospital are in easy reach. Oval tube is at the opposite end of Camberwell New Road. There is a GYM at the end of the road. The house has been in the same family for generations and has lots of charm. The accommodation is arranged over three floors and has a loft room at the top. A brilliant Freehold opportunity for designers or architects to put their own stamp on a property. Chain free.

A Freehold house, close to Waterloo Stations, Southwark tube. Centrally located, within walking distance of Thames River Walk, IMAX, The Cut, The Old Vic Theatre. You can easily walk into the City of London and Covent Garden. This pretty mid terrace house, comprises of a '2 up 2 down' configuration and can be greatly improved. A blank canvass, requiring basic modernisation. Freehold, chain free, ready to buy. You could add a double storey extension to the rear (STPP) and open up the ground floor with a interior design.

A three bedroom mid terrace Victorian home. In need of modernisation, with some period features and a rear garden. Located close to Jessop's primary school. Within walking distance of Herne Hill train station, farmers market and pretty Village style shops. Brockwell Park, Lido and gym as within walking distance. Within reasonable distance to Loughborough junction and Brixton. The house is being sold as a probate sale and access is restricted so please book your viewing in advance.

One bed starter flat, in a handy location between Peckham and Camberwell, on the top (second) floor of a handsome Victorian terraced building. Leasehold. There's a smart shower room, and an independent kitchen with smart fitted units. The reception room features regular and skylight windows. The decor throughout is fresh and white and the double bedroom set to the back of the property, has Velux windows and generous storage in the form of built-in wardrobes.
Peckham and Camberwell and their respective stations (Peckham Rye and Denmark Hill) are both a 15-20 minute walk for Overground and main line services. There are also lots of bus routes on your doorstep and from Peckham Road/Camberwell Church Street, to Elephant & Castle or Oval tube stations and beyond.
Both local town centres have lots on offer with rooftop bars, pubs, cinema and brilliant restaurants. For easy-reach groceries there is a small Tesco store next door to the flat which is also very close to Burgess Park

A third floor apartment with a round bay lounge and balcony. The apartment requires some superficial updating, The fitted kitchen comes with a dishwasher, washing machine and fridge freezer. Mainly needs redecoration throughout and updating kitchen and bathroom. Two double bedrooms. Ruskin Park House is a desirable building of purpose built apartments, maintained to a high standard by the onsite estate manager and caretakers. The character of the block is sought after and due to the prohibition of renting the apartments out to tenants the estate maintains a community feel and familiarity. Very close to Denmark Hill station, Ruskin Park, Herne Hill and its Village farmers market, Peckham and Brixton with vibrant nightlife are close by. Share in the leasehold company, long lease.

Beautifully presented sixth floor, stylish apartment, with a balcony and lovely views. Lots a natural light and a brilliant location; within walking distance to Loughborough Junction station, Brixton Tube, Brixton Market and P.O.P!, Peckham nightlife and Camberwell cafes and all within easy reach. The apartment has two good double bedrooms, two bathrooms, a modern stylish kitchen, with modular screen. Solid wood flooring with underfloor electric heating, ample storage. The flat comes with secure bike storage and a long leasehold.

Grand four bedroom house spread over three floors with two entrances and a large south-east facing, part-walled garden. The Lower Ground floor has two large reception rooms and a cosy kitchen which leads out to the immaculate garden. Upstairs two double rooms currently being used as bedrooms and a bathroom, this floor is versatile and could also be used as a further reception room. Up to the first floor there are two further bedrooms and a bathroom. The master bedroom has a small kitchenette perfect for a self contained unit for an older relative. The property has a huge loft space perfect for storage. This is a great location to utilise the centres of Brockley, New Cross, Deptford and Greenwich. Blackheath, Peckham and Camberwell are also a short bus ride/drive/cycle. Youre also close to Goldsmiths University, Greenwich Park and Brockley market.

Beautiful modern and spacious garden flat. Located within walking distance of Loughborough Junction station, with direct trains to Blackfriars & St. Pancras. Walking distance to Brixton Tube, Denmark Hill and Kings College Hospital. The apartment is part of the award winning Printworks development, it is located at the rear of the building overlooking the gardens and it has 2 pretty walled gardens to the rear and side for private use of this apartment only. In addition there are well kept gardens and bike storage. With a large square footage this apartment has an open plan entertaining space, plenty of storage, lots of natural light and economical underfloor heating with triple glazing mean predictably low running costs.

Freehold house within the Holly Grove conservation area. Three floors and 1150sqft three bedrooms, large reception room, eat-in kitchen, and a double-height bathroom. Despite its period-appearance, the property was built in 2003 A low maintenance modern-build property therefore, with the charm of its Victorian counterparts. The house does not have a rear garden but there is a south-west facing front garden, and you are within easy walking distance of Warwick Gardens and Peckham Rye Park & Commons 113 acres.
Peckham Rye station is a mere 3 minute walk for London Overground and regular services, along with Denmark Hill station and Kings College Hsopital. Youre also so close to buzzing Bellenden Road with its cafes, pubs and independent shops.
Tenure: Freehold

property.propertyFeature9: Close Peckham Rye and Denmark Hill Station
property.mainSummary: A recently and completely renovated one bed ground floor flat with many boasts! As well as being chain free and having a share of the Freehold, the property has its own front door, underfloor heating (that cleverly runs off off-peak electricity), double-glazing throughout, and a modern kitchen and bathroom. Its set in Linwood Close: a leafy landscaped close with private woodland area, a caretaker, and parking for residents (this flat has its own demised parking space). The low-rise development in its spacious grounds is next to Camberwell Grove conservation area, close to Peckham Rye and Denmark Hill Stations - walk to either in just 10 minutes for regular and Overground services.
property.fullDescription: A recently and completely renovated one bed ground floor flat with many boasts! As well as being chain free and having a share of the Freehold, the property has its own front door, underfloor heating (that cleverly runs off off-peak electricity), double-glazing throughout, and a modern kitchen and bathroom. It's set in Linwood Close: a leafy landscaped close with private woodland area, a caretaker, and parking for residents (this flat has its own demised parking space). The low-rise development in its spacious grounds is next to Camberwell Grove conservation area, close to Peckham Rye and Denmark Hill Stations - walk to either in just 10 minutes for regular and Overground services.

property.propertyFeature8: Brockley, Saint Johns, Newcross Deptford Stations
property.mainSummary: A fine four bed house over three floors and of over 1348 square feet, with two entrances and a south-east facing, part-walled garden of well over 100 feet, that has rear access from the mews behind. Location-wise, youre in a very good place here, being within leafy Brockley conservation area, on one of its quietest streets of impressive and varied Victorian housing stock, and within close proximity to Brockley, Saint John's, New Cross and Deptford Bridge DLR stations (walk 6, 14, 15 and 15 minutes respectively). Parking is unrestricted on the street. Freehold.

Three bedroom Victorian house with upstairs bathroom and WC. The kitchen has been replaced in recent years and has a space for a table. Raised secluded garden at the rear. Herne Hill is a very popular area, has excellent amenities, farmer's market, Brockwell Park and Lido, and an eclectic mix of delicatessens and restaurants. Pretty Victorian mid terraced house, located in Herne Hill, very close to Herne Hill station. Trains from Herne Hill go to Victoria and Blackfriars, Farringdon. The house is in good condition with period features such as sash windows and Victorian fireplaces.

A split level, stylish, warehouse apartment in this converted Old Victorian Bakery. Located next to Surrey Canal Path and public park. Close to Peckham Rye BR station and numerous bus routes to the city. A double bedroom with en-suite and single bedroom downstairs, with open plan living and entertaining space upstairs and a further bathroom. Permit parking. Let unfurnished, would suit a couple best and second bedroom is very small. Available part furnished two beds 27/04/2019. https://southwarkcyclists.org.uk/all-you-ever-wanted-to-know-about-the-bike-train-route/

A well-appointed one double bedroom, 2nd floor apartment with large open plan kitchen / living space. Full length balcony overlooking the picturesque Ruskin Park. Fantastic location very close to Kings College Hospital and Denmark Hill Overground Station. Would suit professional or couple. Available from 12/10/2019 part furnished.

A delightful bright and airy top floor Victorian apartment, in central Camberwell. Two double bedrooms, living room, separate kitchen, with space for a small dining table. Large skylight lets lots of natural light in. A pleasant spacious flat, ideal for a couple or professional sharers. Walking distance to Elephant and Castle, Kennington and Denmark Hill. Very close to Kings College hospital. 04/07/2019 furnished

Beautiful 3 double bedroom split level Victorian garden flat on Herne Hill Road. Walking distance to Brixton Tube, Loughborough Junction & Denmark Hill overland. Very close to St Saviours School, Jessops and Charter. Located in the Ruskin Park Village area with Ruskin park summer bandstand concerts and padding pool. Brixton nightlife bars and restaurants in the Village are within walking distance. The apartment is very well laid out and has bifolding glass doors leading out to a large garden with a patio. Available 7th September unfurnished.

Lovely three double bedroom flat with separate living room and private balcony. Ideally located for King's College Hospital and Camberwell College of Arts. A fun and vibrant place to live, with plenty of bars, shops and restaurants to be found in nearby Camberwell, Peckham, East Dulwich and Brixton. Excellent bus links to Central London from Camberwell Green. Denmark Hill Overground offers ten minute links to Victoria and easy access to Canada Water and Shoreditch High Street. Available furnished from Tuesday 8th October 2019.

Absolutely stunning in Architectural and interior design. Brand new split level apartment in a sought after location. Walking distance to Kings College Hospital and Denmark Hill station with efficient links into Central London. The apartment has been designed to a show flat standard and comprises two double bedrooms, with large built in wardrobes. A beautiful modern bathroom with shower and stunning cooking and entertaining space on the top floor with large skylights and windows creating a stunning cooking and entertaining space The apartment has exceptional storage. Flexible furnishing and available 26/06/2019.

property.propertyFeature6: Great restaurants, cafes and pubs nearby
property.propertyFeature10: Parks at Crystal Palace/Sydenham Hill Woods
property.mainSummary: Spacious mid-century three bedroom townhouse, in beautiful condition. Ideal for a family or sharers, it features a large living room, modern kitchen and bathroom. There is a handy utility / laundry room with good storage on the ground floor. Good size garden and off street parking. Located in a cul-de-sac off of the prestigious Laurie Park Gardens, excellent connections into central London & short walk to Sydenham station and High Street. Available 1st July.

A beautifully presented mid terrace Victorian Townhouse. Located within walking distance of Brixton tube, Loughborough Junction and Denmark Hill Stations. Arranged over three floors with a pretty rear garden. There are three double bedrooms and two bathrooms. Open plan light and spacious reception room, modern and well presented kitchen. The house is offered for a long term, furnished let. Available from 30th July 2019

Urban Village. A charming bijou 1930s, fully furnished mansion apartment. Beautifully presented with lots of natural light. A double bedroom with a large fitted wardrobe and a window seat in a bay window over additional storage. A bright living room with an integral, small but fully equipped kitchen with built in appliances. An en-suite bathroom-shower room. The apartment is on the ground floor of this well maintained mansion block, accessed via a grand entrance. Additional bicycle storage, parking within the grounds. Excellent transport links to the City/West End including nearby Denmark Hill, Herne Hill, North and East Dulwich stations. Brixton tube is 10 minutes bus ride away and several buses almost on the doorstep. Walking distance to Kings College Hospital, Ruskin Park and Brockwell Park. The flat is central and accessible and unexpectedly quiet despite being on the upper, green part of Denmark Hill.

A spacious two double bedroom apartment, on Camberwell Church Street, furnished, double glazing, gas central heating, large lounge and dining table in the kitchen. An excellent location for shops, bars and cafes in Camberwell, Peckham and Brixton. Great transport links via Denmark Hill Station and numerous buses. Oval tube is a short bus ride or walkable. Suits professional sharers, available now, furnished.

Urban Village. A beautifully presented modern Victorian terrace townhouse. Located within walking distance of Brixton tube, Loughborough Junction, Herne Hill and Denmark Hill Stations. Arranged over three floors with a rear garden that has fruit trees. There are four double bedrooms and two bathrooms. Open plan light and spacious reception room, modern and well presented kitchen. The house is offered for a long term, unfurnished let. Available from 06/11/2019

property.propertyFeature7: Easy access to City / West End
property.mainSummary: Urbanvillagehomes.com A beautifully presented and interior designed, 3 bedroom house. A fantastic commute with less than a 10-minute journey to the City and the West End. Thames River Walk, Tate Modern and Southbank are all within a reasonable walking distance. Outstanding local schools. The upper floor has a vaulted ceiling, elevating into the roof line, maximising head height and natural light. Spacious and bright living accommodation on the ground floor, with a modern kitchen and the lounge has doors leading out to a decked rear garden. There are 3 double bedrooms, a bathroom and separate loo. Kennington tube is just a few minutes walk away as is Kennington park and the area is surprisingly quiet due to no through traffic.

Beautiful bright and spacious split level maisonette with sun terrace. Three good sized bedrooms, large open plan entertaining space with a modern fitted kitchen, separate utility and excellent storage. Located within walking distance to Denmark Hill station, Herne Hill with its Farmer's market, Kings college hospital and Ruskin Park. A quiet cul-de-sac location views into the treetops from most rooms, lovely decked sun terrace at the rear.

Well presented Victorian house. Four double bedrooms and two bathrooms. There is a cosy living room, with large feature bay window and Victorian fireplace. The kitchen is large enough for a small dining table and has double doors leading out to a small low-maintenance back yard, ideal for BBQs. McDowall road is located close to Myatt's Field Park and walking distance to Oval tube. Numerous frequent bus routes make this a popular property for professional tenants.

property.propertyFeature9: Two minute walk to Vauxhall station
property.mainSummary: Brand new, stunning riverside apartment on the 11th floor of The Corniche, Albert Embankment. The flat boasts panoramic views of the London skyline, looking straight out towards the Shard. With a spacious bedroom and stylish modern bathroom, the hallway leads through into the living room/diner with its large floor to ceiling windows and balcony. Furthermore the concierge, indoor pool and gymnasium add to the luxurious feel this apartment brings. Not to be missed. Available the 31st August.

Stylish top floor eco-apartment in this stunning, award winning, architecturally designed building. Arranged over the top two floors with incredible skyline views. The accommodation is arranged to maximise space and light with the main living accommodation on the top floor and completely open plan. Downstairs there are three bedrooms, one has an en suite, plus a good sized family bathroom and separate laundry area. Both floors have balconies stretching across the south facing side of the building. There is secure gated car parking, cycle storage and a passenger lift to all floors. Walking distance to Denmark Hill and East Dulwich station, shops and restaurants nearby.

A beautiful Victorian conversion flat with a garden in Brixton on a sought after road. Two good-sized double bedrooms, a large bathroom, and spacious kitchen. Lots of natural light and a feeling of space. Direct to a private garden.
Walking distance to Brixton tube, Herne Hill farmers market, Brockwell park.
Available furnished from 30th September 2019.

Beautifully stylish maisonette with interior design In the sought after Gilesmead estate opposite St. Giles Church in Camberwell. Ground floor, split level maisonette with garden. Two double bedrooms and two bathrooms. Within walking distance of Camberwell Green and Peckham Rye. Excellent transport links and local amenities such as Camberwell Green farmer's market, shops and restaurants. Peckham Rye park and Peckham nightlife. Walking distance to Denmark Hill Station, Ruskin Park, Kings College hospital and Camberwell College of Arts. The rent includes heating and hot water. Suit professional sharers. Furnished; available 1st November.

Extensively renovated garden flat. Having recently undergone a brand new heating system, including replacing all internal underfloor pipework, this stylish apartment should be warm and cosy. There are two good-sized bedrooms, modern, tiled, shower room and lounge. There is a practical galley kitchen with small breakfast bar. There is a small garden at the front and larger garden at the rear. The apartment is available now and unfurnished. Located very close to Queen's Road Peckham with swift access to London Bridge and the East End. Popular destination with quirky nightlife and award winning bars and restaurants.

property.propertyFeature3: Close to Ruskin and Brockwell Park
property.mainSummary: Located in the heart of Denmark Hill, this top floor 2 bedroom light and airy apartment is perfect for professionals sharers. Tayside Court is within a short walking distance to both Denmark Hill and Herne Hill stations which provides convenient transport links to Victoria, Kings Cross and even the cool bars of Shoreditch and Peckham. Stunning views can be enjoyed within the well laid out, fully furnished space; either through the double glazed windows or balcony. Or better yet, explore the views on foot as Herne Hill Market, Ruskin Park, Brockwell Park and Lido are within walking distance. Furnished, available from 11th September. Ex council.

Beautiful first floor studio apartment, in a private gated community, grade II listed building. This bright apartment has lots of character and overlooks the well kept communal gardens. All heating and hot water bills included offered fully furnished and available immediately. Pilgrims Cloisters is conveniently located in between Peckham and Camberwell lots of local amenities and transport links available.

Large three bedroom house, opposite Brockwell Park with it's Lido and gym, very close to Herne Hill Station and the farmer's market. A pretty front garden with rose arch leads up to the Victorian property. Through lounge, with open plan kitchen / entertaining space. Stylish glass walkway, beside a stylish, decked courtyard garden, leading to a large reception room / self contained bedroom. First floor bathroom and additional ground floor WC. The property is in lovely condition, well loved by the owners. Looking for professional long term tenants, family or group of 3 preferred. Available 1st May, furnished.

Bright and spacious one bedroom flat on Varcoe road, within walking distance of local amenities and South Bermondsey train station for easy access to central London. The apartment has wood flooring, modern kitchen, spacious reception room and new bathroom. Close to local bars and restaurants, shops and gastropubs. Part furnished. Available from 19th April.

Recently renovated one bedroom flat, has brand new kitchen and décor throughout, lots of storage. Perfectly located for easy access to Kings College hospital, Brixton tube, Loughborough Junction and all of the amenities in Brixton and Camberwell. Perfect for a single person or professional couple. Offered furnished, available immediately.

Stylish one bedroom apartment, with large roof terrace and stunning views. This gated development has the added benefit of underground parking, concierge and lifts. Ideal for a couple or individual, one large bedrooms and luxurious bathroom. Open plan entertaining space with well designed kitchen, large windows and doors open out to the roof terrace with lots of natural light and views towards the City. Peckham Rye station is amongst the excellent transport links, opposite Burgess Park. Available 8th April can be part or unfurnished.

Stunning Victorian terrace house. Walking distance to Herne Hill, Brockwell Park and Lido, farmer's market, Loughborough junction station and Brixton tube. Beautifully presented and extended with large kitchen / breakfast room and loft en suite. A further three bedrooms and bathroom on the first floor (the smallest bedroom is small, just about fit a double). Double reception and pretty rear garden. Residents permit parking. Available 12th June, unfurnished.

Immaculate modern first floor apartment with large decked balcony. Bright and airy open plan living accommodation, ideal for entertaining and dinner parties. Two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a large stylish bathroom. Built in 2015 to a high standard which has been maintained by the current owners. Clean lines, modern finishes and lots of natural light make this apartment stand out. Brixton tube is easily accessible and Brixton POP and vibrant Brixton Village are just a short walk away with a local gym just one road over. Loughborough Junction with direct, fast trains to Blackfriars & St. Pancras. Ruskin Park with it's summer bandstand concerts and village feel. Kings college hospital is a short walk. Unfurnished available 26th April

Bright and stylish top floor Victorian conversion apartment. One double bedroom, large lounge and pretty kitchen. has a spacious feel and is ideal for a single or couple. Located within walking distance of Loughborough junction rail station (Blackfriars, St. Pancras) Brixton tube, is some 15 min on foot, Ruskin Park, Denmark Hill station (Victoria) Herne Hill Farmers market, Brockwell Lido and brand new local Gym 2 roads up. Offered furnished from 31st May.

In the process of having new carpets in the lounge and a new washing machine. This one bedroom first floor Victorian apartment is very well located for Brixton Tube, Loughborough junction station with fast trains to Blackfriars, St. Pancras and Kings Cross. The apartment has one small double bedroom, good sized lounge, separate kitchen and bathroom. Brilliant local amenities; Kings College hospital, Ruskin Park and Camberwell. Offered unfurnished. Availible immediately

This recently renovated, one bedroom modern apartment offers you a lounge/diner, modern kitchen, good sized bathroom, double bedroom and allocated off street parking. Situated in a courtyard development with secure phone entry systems, a few minute's walk from local amenities and Hackbridge train station (20 minutes to London Bridge and Victoria). Mitcham Junction station is a short walk away as are lots of green spaces, Mitcham common and Beddington Park nature reserve. Offered furnished and available immediately.

Smart one double bedroom apartment, very close to Denmark Hill Station and Kings College Hospital. Available to rent, in the popular Groveland's Close development, off of Camberwell Grove, allowing excellent access to shops, bars, restaurants and transport. Available furnished mid July. Suit professional couple.

Stunning fourth floor apartment in this iconic 1930's mansion block in central Brixton. Two double bedrooms, large lounge and spacious kitchen, new stylish bathroom with walk-in shower suite. The apartment is furnished and presented to a high standard throughout, including newly fitted kitchen with high spec appliances, built in wardrobes in the bedrooms. Lots of natural light and tree top views. The apartment is located just off of Baytree Road, near Brixton Town Hall, very close to Brixton Tube, shops, restaurants, Brixton POP and Brockwell Park. Great for those wanting to be near everything, with fantastic transport; and have a quiet, stylish place to return to. Offered furnished and available 3rd October 2019. There is a (paid) secure bicycle parking facility on the block. Extra £50.00 per month on top for cleaning, per month.

Stylish, light and airy split level apartment. Three double bedrooms, reception, separate kitchen and two bathrooms. There is an additional study in the loft suite. A pretty rear garden at the back of the property, for the exclusive use if this apartment. lovely design features throughout. Located opposite the top end of Brockwell Park, Excellent access to Brixton, Tule Hill Station and Herne Hill (Brockwell Lido, Gym and Farmer's market. A terrific place to live. Suit family or professional sharers. Furnished, available 01/11/2019.

A fourth floor, one bedroom apartment with lift access in this popular iconic 1930's mansion block in the Heart of Brixton. The apartment has a double bedroom, bright lounge (with tree top views) the bathroom and kitchen are a little dated. Brixton Hill Court is located close to Brixton Tube, Brixton Village and POP. Brockwell park, with it's Lido and GYM. Ideal for a couple, or individual professional, set back from the day and night-life but close enough to have fun. Avaliable from 5th August, furnished.

property.propertyFeature2: Walking distance to Anerley and Penge West Station
property.mainSummary: Located a stones throw from Crystal Palace Park on a pleasant Victorian road, this spacious two-bedroom maisonette includes a 14ft lounge, New carpets and a brand new kitchen appliances. The light and airy property has great transport links, Crystal Palace, Anerley and Penge West stations are both within walking distance. Frequent railway and Overground services to London Bridge, Victoria, East London & the City make travelling around London easy; whether it be for commuting or leisure. Excellent storage including a boarded loft and external garage/utility rom which connects to a private garden. Available unfurnished from the 1st September.

An impressively large warehouse apartment at almost 900 sqft (80 sqm). With flexible living accommodation, designed as a 'live work' unit in Shoreditch E2. Designed with good space and light, solid wood flooring and a modern kitchen and bathroom. Open plan living in within walking distance to Shoreditch High Street, BOX park, Spitalfields market, Brick Lane, numerous mix of eclectic and high end restaurants, bars and shops. Fantastic transport. Avaliable end of August, un-furnished.

Lovely purpose built ground floor flat with a private garden. Located off Champion Hill, very close to Denmark Hill Station with the London Overground service to Victoria, Blackfriars, Shoreditch. Three bedrooms, large reception. Separate kitchen, bathroom and separate W.C. Wood laminate flooring, double glazing and gas central heating. Offered furnished from 28th September. East Dulwich and Peckham are within walking distance, along with Kings College Hospital and Ruskin Park.

property.propertyFeature4: Large kitchen and separate utility room
property.mainSummary: Two bed Victorian. Beautiful light and airy top floor conversion apartment with private garden. One double bedroom, plus a small box room ideal for an office or baby. Modern fitted kitchen and bathroom with separate bath and shower. Heaps of storage and a utility room that leads out to the garden. Perfect for a couple looking for an easy commute into London. On good bus & cycle routes. Lordship Lane shops and restaurants are on your doorstep. East Dulwich, Peckham Rye and Denmark Hill train stations are all within walking distance. Local green spaces include Peckham Rye and Goose Green.

property.propertyFeature5: Walking Distance to Denmark Hill Train Station
property.propertyFeature10: Walking Distance to East Dulwich Station
property.mainSummary: COUPLE OR SINGAL OCCUPANT ONLY no sharers as 2nd bedroom is too small. A Bright and stylish top floor apartment. two bedrooms, with a large open planned lounge and kitchen area. Has a spacious feel and is ideal for a couple. Located close to local amenities and parks. The property is located 15mins away from kings college Hospital, and close to Shops and restaurants on Lordship lane, Bellenden Road and East Dulwich. Excellent transport links into the central London and within walking distance of Denmark Hill Rail Station (Victoria, London Bridge, Shoreditch).
